Interface FESI.Extensions.BasicIOInterface

public interface BasicIOInterface
The interface of all BasicIO extensions, used bu the interpreter to access the document object.

getDocument()
Return an object with the document routines (for compatibility with Netscape).

getDocument 
 public abstract ESObject getDocument()
Return an object with the document routines (for compatibility with Netscape). This object will be the "document" object and the caller may add its URL property.
